description: Text to Speech plugin using Responsive Voice! NO SUPPORT PROVIDED, please contact Responsive Voice for help. I am in no way affiliated with Responsive Voice.
name: Responsive Voice Text to Speech
plugin_instructions: Please register an account with Responsive Voice, then in the dashboard fill out the form, and at the end you will receive a code. Enter the code in the Plugins tab for this plugin and done! The action is called Responsive Voice Text to Speech, simply just type in the Text or use a dynamic value and away you go!
